name: Prison break: the real story
description:
Michael and Lincoln have finally escaped! Destroy the prison guards with the rope that binds you, but don't get the guards in your face. Avoid the obstacles, the rope could get caught in them. Controls: Left character: Move A/D or Q/D Right character: Move ←/→

Disclaimer: The scenes in this game are fictional. We don't tolerate any violence against public forces.

You can play alone or in co-op...
